parameter.value: Welcome on board, Sir |PLAYERNAME|. I can take you to Thais, Carlin, Venore, Abdendriel, Edron, Svargrond, Goroma, Ankrahmun, Darashia, Liberty Bay, Port Hope, Yalahar, Oken, Gengia, Pyre, Vikia, Ghala, Ghenov, Demona, Poh, Zao and Razachai.
Good bye. Recommend us if you were satisfied with our service.
